description: TargetRef describes target for user traffic forwarding. one of target types can be chosen: crd or static per targetRef. user can define multiple targetRefs with different ref Types.

crd.description: CRD describes exist operator's CRD object, operator generates access url based on CRD params.

static.description: Static - user defined url for traffic forward, for instance http://vmsingle:8428

targetRefBasicAuth.description: TargetRefBasicAuth allow an target endpoint to authenticate over basic authentication

target_path_suffix.description: TargetPathSuffix allows to add some suffix to the target path It allows to hide tenant configuration from user with crd as ref. it also may contain any url encoded params.
